headline: Nvidia’s Unspoken Problem: 40% of Revenue Comes From Companies Developing Their Own AI Chips
summary: Jensen Huang has built a $4.6 trillion empire selling the picks and shovels of the AI revolution. But while he preaches accelerated computing, three existential threats aren’t discussed in earnings calls. They’re happening now. Threat #1: Your Best Customers Are Building Your Replacement Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT), Meta (NASDAQ:META), Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN), and Alphabet (NASDAQ:GOOGL) represent 40-50% of ... Nvidia’s Unspoken Problem: 40% of Revenue Comes From Companies Developing Their Own AI Chips

headline: Nvidia set to supplant Apple as TSMC's top customer, signaling chip industry's 'changing dynamic'
summary: The positional swap will mark a fundamental shift in the semiconductor industry, reflecting Nvidia's growing importance amid the AI infrastructure buildout.
